title: self_dug_groundwater_well_with_submersible_pump
summary: Self-dug groundwater well used as a primary water source.
description: This data unit records a groundwater well manually dug at MaMeeFarm. The well has a depth of approximately 7 meters and has been in use for over seven years. The water source supports household and farm operations in a location without access to public electricity or municipal water supply at the time of construction.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
